item.title: Twitter
item.description: Twitter # The group has a Twitter account @sa2c_swansea. The purpose of the account is to have an informal public-facing channel where we can communicate about projects we are working on, and to promote e.g. job opportunities. Access # If you want to tweet under the group account, ask the account controller for access. This also gives you access to Some levels.
